metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8797 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function process_plane() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.8.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
